1.name: Potion
1.flavor_text: Restores the HP of a POKéMON by 20 points.

2.name: Full Restore
2.flavor_text: Fully restores the HP and status of a POKéMON.
2.effect: Restores HP to full and cures any status ailment and confusion.

3.name: Max Potion
3.flavor_text: Fully restores the HP of a POKéMON.

4.name: Hyper Potion
4.flavor_text: Restores the HP of a POKéMON by 200 points.

5.name: Super Potion
5.flavor_text: Restores the HP of a POKéMON by 50 points.

6.name: Fresh Water
6.flavor_text: A mineral water that restores HP by 50 points.

7.name: Soda Pop
7.flavor_text: A fizzy soda drink that restores HP by 60 points.

8.name: Lemonade
8.flavor_text: A very sweet drink that restores HP by 80 points.

9.name: Moomoo Milk
9.flavor_text: A nutritious milk that restores HP by 100 points.

10.name: Energy Powder
10.flavor_text: A bitter powder that restores HP by 50 points.

11.name: Energy Root
11.flavor_text: A bitter root that restores HP by 200 points.

12.name: Berry Juice
12.flavor_text: A 100% pure juice that restores HP by 20 points.

13.name: Sweet Heart
13.flavor_text: Very sweet chocolate.   It restores the HP of one Pokémon by only 20 points.

14.name: Cheri Berry
14.flavor_text: A hold item that heals paralysis in battle.
14.effect: Held: Consumed when paralyzed to cure paralysis.

15.name: Chesto Berry
15.flavor_text: A hold item that awakens POKéMON in battle.
15.effect: Held: Consumed when asleep to cure sleep.

16.name: Pecha Berry
16.flavor_text: A hold item that heals poisoning in battle.
16.effect: Held: Consumed when poisoned to cure poison.

17.name: Rawst Berry
17.flavor_text: A hold item that heals a burn in battle.
17.effect: Held: Consumed when burned to cure a burn.

18.name: Aspear Berry
18.flavor_text: A hold item that defrosts POKéMON in battle.
18.effect: Held: Consumed when frozen to cure frozen.

19.name: Leppa Berry
19.flavor_text: A hold item that restores 10 PP in battle.
19.effect: Held: Consumed when a move runs out of PP to restore its PP by 10.

20.name: Oran Berry
20.flavor_text: A hold item that restores 10 HP in battle.
20.effect: Held: Consumed at 1/2 max HP to recover 10 HP.

21.name: Persim Berry
21.flavor_text: A hold item that heals confusion in battle.
21.effect: Held: Consumed when confused to cure confusion.

22.name: Lum Berry
22.flavor_text: A hold item that heals status in battle.
22.effect: Held: Consumed to cure any status condition or confusion.

23.name: Sitrus Berry
23.flavor_text: A hold item that restores 30 HP in battle.
23.effect: Held: Consumed at 1/2 max HP to recover 1/4 max HP.

24.name: Revive
24.flavor_text: Revives a fainted POKéMON with half its HP.

25.name: Max Revive
25.flavor_text: Revives a fainted POKéMON with all its HP.

26.name: Revival Herb
26.flavor_text: A very bitter herb that revives a fainted POKéMON.
26.effect: Revives with full HP, but lowers happiness.

27.name: Sacred Ash
27.flavor_text: Fully revives and restores all fainted POKéMON.
27.effect: Revives all fainted Pokémon with full HP.

33.name: Full Heal
33.flavor_text: Heals all the status problems of one POKéMON.
33.effect: Cures any status ailment and confusion.

34.name: Heal Powder
34.flavor_text: A bitter powder that heals all status problems.
34.effect: Cures any status ailment, but lowers happiness.

35.name: Lava Cookie
35.flavor_text: A local specialty that heals all status problems.
35.effect: Cures any status ailment and confusion.

36.name: Old Gateau
36.flavor_text: Old Chateau’s hidden specialty. It heals all the status problems of a single Pokémon.
36.effect: Cures any status ailment and confusion.

37.name: Casteliacone
37.flavor_text: Castelia City’s specialty, soft-serve ice cream. It heals all the status problems of a single Pokémon.
37.effect: Cures any status ailment and confusion.

38.name: Lumiose Galette
38.flavor_text: A popular treat in Lumiose City. It can be used once to heal all the status conditions of a Pokémon.
38.effect: Cures all major status ailments and confusion.

39.name: Shalour Sable
39.flavor_text: Shalour City’s famous shortbread. It can be used once to heal all the status conditions of a Pokémon.
39.effect: Cures any major status ailment and confusion.

40.name: Big Malasada
40.flavor_text: The Alola region’s local specialty—fried bread. It can be used once to heal all the status conditions of a Pokémon.
40.effect: Cures major status ailments and confusion.
